verses.verse: Then said <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068> unto me <WH4872>, Though Moses and Samuel <WH8050> stood <WH5975> before <WH6440> me <WH5315>, yet my mind would not be toward this people <WH5971>: cast them out <WH7971> of my sight <WH6440>, and let them go forth <WH3318>.

Therefore thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068>, If thou return <WH7725>, then will I bring thee again <WH7725>, that thou mayest stand <WH5975> before <WH6440> me <WH3318>; and if thou take forth the precious <WH3368> from the vile <WH2151>, thou shalt be as my mouth <WH6310>: they shall return <WH7725> unto thee <WH7725>, but thou shalt not return unto them.

And I will make <WH5414> thee unto this people <WH5971> a fortified <WH1219> brazen <WH5178> wall <WH2346>; and they shall fight <WH3898> against thee <WH3201>, but they shall not prevail against thee <WH3467>; for I am with thee to save thee and to deliver <WH5337> thee <WH5002>, saith Jehovah <WH3068>.
And I will deliver <WH5337> thee out of the hand <WH3027> of the wicked <WH7451>, and I will redeem <WH6299> thee out of the hand <WH3709> of the terrible <WH6184>.
